modName: Elf Children of Skyrim - an Xvision Children Redone addon
summary: Adds adoptable High/Dark/Wood Elf as well as Orc and Dremora children to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Good news everyone. Mrs Teal (that's me) is back to playing Skyrim, and therefore modding. I sort of wanted to remake my old child mods and created separate child races from the adult versions. There is 9 children in total in this mod. This mod is not entirely lorefriendly, so.. I know Dremora can't have children. But I thought why not? Even players of that race should be allowed to have kids of their own kind.
[b]Managed to make the children adoptable now, as I realized I hadn't set the faction rank to 1. So it should work now.[/b]

[b]Where to find the kids?[/b]
-Woodelves: In Riverwood near the sawmill respective inside the windmill outside Whiterun.
-Highelves: Solitude.
-Darkelves: Windhelm.
-Dremora: Outside respective inside Mehrunes Shrine.
-Orc boy: In the bandit camp outside Whiterun, where you can find skooma.

[b]Required files[/b]
-Hearthfire
-Xvision Children Redone

[b]Recommended files[/b]
-No More Blocky Faces (Less Ugly Elven Faces version)
-Eye enhancement mods

[b]Known bugs[/b]
-If you can't find Camden in Solitude, bring up the console and type "prid xx00603f" (with xx being the number of your load order) and then type "moveto player".
-The children have neck seams, they might have it in the Xvision mod as well.

[b]Future plans[/b]
-Add an orc girl.
-Fix further bugs (let me know if you find any)

[b]Things I'm not planning in the near future[/b]
-Make the child races of this mod playable.

[b]Credits[/b]
-Zazemel for the head meshes of their Drow Race mod.
-Bugsbugme and Bagserk for the Xvision Children mod.
-mrjentipede for the orc head mesh of their Kids Of Skyrim mod.
-And at last, I thank Bethesda for making this mod possible.

Hope you guys enjoy this mod! Don't forget to endorse if it worked for you. And I'm always open for suggestions! :-)
author: T3alrose
